baseUrl.title: Website URL
baseUrl.description: The URL to start crawling from. Can be a homepage, category page, or specific article.

maxPages.title: Max pages to crawl
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl. Set lower for faster runs.

maxCrawlDepth.title: Crawl depth
maxCrawlDepth.description: How deep to crawl. 1 = only starting page, 2 = starting page + linked pages, 3 = go deeper into articles, etc.

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Number of pages to crawl in parallel. Higher = faster but more server load.

checkExternalLinks.title: Check external links
checkExternalLinks.description: If true, also check if external links (to other websites) are broken.

saveOnlyBrokenLinks.title: Save only broken links
saveOnlyBrokenLinks.description: If true, only broken links are saved to dataset. If false, all links are saved.

crawlSubdomains.title: Crawl subdomains
crawlSubdomains.description: If true, also crawl subdomains (e.g., blog.example.com when crawling example.com).

notificationEmails.title: Notification emails
notificationEmails.description: Email addresses to notify when broken links are found.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings. Recommended for large crawls to avoid IP blocks.
